skins.shipDescription: Hermes-class aircraft carrier ¨C Hermes, Hull Number 95!
skins.selfIntroduction: I am called Hermes, I was the second aircraft carrier to be ever built. The only carrier to be sunk by the Sakura Empire? Can't do much about stuff like that. But if I ever get the chance, I want to duel that first carrier.
skins.acquisition: Glory to the cards, my soul to the duel d... I mean, the flight deck! I am Hermes. Commander, give me your orders!
skins.login: You're back. Now it's time to duel!
skins.details: Statistics aren't important, it's how you take advantage of them.
skins.secretaryIdle1: It is my wish to duel with Houshou
skins.secretaryIdle2: In each plane and every card resides a soul.
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's my turn!Victory aside, I also want to bring happiness to everyone.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hmm.... If the Commander is interested, I'll properly reward you each time you win.

skins.shipDescription: Our glory coalesces into the bonds that forge a bright new future! Let's rev it up! Hermes, retrofit complete!
skins.acquisition: Our glory coalesces into the bonds that forge a bright new future! Let's rev it up! Hermes, retrofit complete!
skins.login: I've been waiting. The cards... no... my burning soul told me you'd returned.
skins.details: For a true duelist, there are no accidents, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Houshou is strong. And now I know. That strength comes from her kindness.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Your spirit is a great weapon, and an even greater weakness. No matter where you are, you must not forget that.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Centaur taught me how to make this. Try it. I'm showing you that I'm more than just a duelist.
skins.secretaryTouch: That's the wind... Commander, follow my wake!
